body: @amihaiemil[/z](https://www.0crat.com/u/amihaiemil) please, pay attention to this issue
@amihaiemil I would do it similar to `RtIssue.exists()`. Also, I would move `RtIssue.exists()` to `Issue.Smart`. Can't understand why it's in the `Issue` interface :(

@amihaiemil I guess, we need those `exists()` methods here:

  * `Blob.Smart`
  * `Branch.Smart`
  * `Comment.Smart`
  * `Commit.Smart`
  * `Event.Smart`
  * `Fork.Smart`
  * `Gist.Smart`
  * `GistComment.Smart`
  * `Hook.Smart`
  * `Issue.Smart`
  * `Label.Smart`
  * `Milestone.Smart`
  * `Organization.Smart`
  * `PublicKey.Smart`
  * `Pull.Smart`
  * `Release.Smart`
  * `Repo.Smart`
  * `Tag.Smart`
  * `User.Smart`
@yegor256 yes, sounds like a good idea; do you want to do it?

Job [#1379](https://github.com/jcabi/jcabi-github/issues/1379) is now in scope, role is `DEV`
